Interface AddButtons

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HighScoreScreen, InstructionsScreen, OptionScreen, UpgradeScreen, WelcomeScreen

    public interface AddButtons
    An interface that lets screens be able to add interactive buttons to them
    Author:
    elan
    See Also:
    Screen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addButtons(int numButtons, java.lang.String[] types)
      Adds the Buttons to any class that implements this interface

    • Method Detail

      • addButtons

        void addButtons(int numButtons,
              java.lang.String[] types)
        Adds the Buttons to any class that implements this interface
        Parameters:
        numButtons - The number of buttons you would like the child to have
        types - The strings you would like displayed on each button respectively
